name: Bunny Overdrive
description:
Bunny Overdrive is one of the most challenging top down 2D shooters in terms of fun and exciting gameplay, featuring fast-paced movement and unhinged combat that delivers a high octane experience to its players.

• Choose between two adorable rage-filled bunnies ready to fight their enemies with their unique set of abilities. Choose wisely!

• Pick your weapon of choice to combat squads of unforgiving and cunning enemies.

• Fight your way out through challenging and ever evolving levels that will put your gaming skills to the test.
